title: GO SMS Pro Blue iPhone Theme
creator: Pack Of Themes

extendedInfo.description: Application for sending sms in blue looks like a fake iPhone 5. The main menu has a blue background and the names of messages have white subtitles. The main menu bar is dark blue with white text and white and blue icons. Background sms window is milky white. Background of the message is blue, has white blue icons and elements. Text SMS is the recipient white blue au sender. Background of the text message is blue with dark blue text, contains white blue icons and elements. Simple and classic look of the application is for those who appreciate minimalism, our application looks like the iPhone, so you do not have to buy an iPhone just that you download this app.Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:- background like iPhone's one- changed icons to look like iPhone Messenger- well matched colors may be helpful when typing sms messages- changed contact list, message compose and popup window. How to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Blue iPhone Theme for free.2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Blue iPhone Theme and click apply.How to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - Pack Of ThemesIf you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: packofthemes@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Please contact us in this language because we will solve your problem easier.Comments and rating:If you want to help other users find our theme please leave comment and positive rating.Before posting negative opinion please contact us. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Our thematically similar applications:iPhone 5 GO Locker ThemeGO SMS Pro Pink iPhone ThemeOur other applications:GO Launcher EX Hearts ThemeGO Launcher EX Theme KittyGO SMS Pro Theme PenguinGO SMS Pro Theme HeartsGO Locker Themes HeartsGO Locker Music ThemeAdvertising:This free application is ads supported. Ads may show in notification tray and / or your smartphone home screen. Permissions are for ads.Other themes from Pack Of ThemesFull list of our themes is available by clicking our developer name on Google Play.Check our other  GO Launcher EX, GO SMS Pro and GO Locker free themes. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.
